onboarding.welcome_desc: Discover a new way to shop with our 3D and Augmented Reality technology.
onboarding.ar_desc: Try products in your own space using your device's camera.
onboarding.cart_desc: Add products to cart and complete your purchase securely and quickly.

chair.title: Modern Chair
chair.desc: Ergonomic chair with modern design and adjustable lumbar support.

box.title: Center Table
box.desc: Center table made of solid wood with natural finish.

lantern.title: Floor Lamp
lantern.desc: Floor lamp with minimalist design and adjustable LED light.

box_animated.title: Modular Sofa
box_animated.desc: Modular 3-seater sofa with premium fabric upholstery.

shelf.title: Floating Shelf
shelf.desc: Floating shelf with Scandinavian design and 4 levels.

desk.title: Executive Desk
desk.desc: Executive desk made of oak with side drawers.

footer.about: Experience the future of e-commerce with our 3D visualization and Augmented Reality technology.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This project is a demo. Replace this content with your real privacy policy.
privacy.data_text: We do not store personal data beyond what is necessary to demonstrate the product experience.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: These terms are illustrative. Adapt them to your business and legal requirements.
terms.use_text: Use this demo only for evaluation and testing purposes.

license.title: License
license.intro: Information about how this demo and its content can be used.
license.ownership_text: All 3D models, images and brand elements are for demonstration only.

home.subtitle: Discover our exclusive collection of furniture and decor. Use Augmented Reality to see how everything looks in your home before you buy.
home.feature_models_desc: See every texture and detail with our high‑fidelity 3D models.
home.feature_ar_desc: Place products in your room using your phone's camera.

favorites_page.empty_desc: Save the products you like the most to view them later.

history_page.title: View History
history_page.error_desc: Try reloading the page or come back later.
history_page.empty_desc: Products you visit will appear here so you can find them easily.

catalog_page.title: Product Catalog
catalog_page.empty_desc: Try adjusting the filters or search to find what you need.

compare.empty_hint: Select up to 2 products to compare

viewer.error_subtitle: There was a problem displaying this product.
viewer.file_not_found: The model file was not found on the server
viewer.not_found_404: The model file was not found on the server (404)

ar.not_supported: AR is not available on this device
ar.not_supported_with_hint: AR is not available on this device. Try a mobile device with AR support.
ar.ios_https_required: The model must be available over HTTPS to use AR on iOS.
ar.cannot_start: Could not start AR. Make sure the file is publicly available over HTTPS.
